dct_title_s: Regni Davidici et Salomonæi descriptio geographica cum vicinis regionibus Syriæ et Ægypti
dct_description_sm: concinnata a Joh. Matthia Hasio math. p. mappa principalis schema II.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
6 bar scales on map given in "Stadia recentiora", "Stadia Aegyptia", "Milliaria romana", "Milliaria germanica", and "Leucae gall. minores", and "Leuc. gall. majores".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text to the left of the map: [Explanatory text with three schemas].
